# time

**Instance Property**

The parametric time of the transition.

## Declaration

```swift
var time: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value drives the transition from start, at time 0, to end, at time 1.

## Instance Properties

- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **targetImage**: The target image for a transition.
